import React from "react"; import AdminDrawerComponent from "../../../components/AdminDrawerComponent"; import { gql, useQuery } from "@apollo/client"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const FETCH_AUDIOS = gql` query { audios { _id title date_production productors nbr_invoice nbr_contract type_support nbr_support tech_comments quality language frequency synopsis type commentator event_location event_date sequence presenter preparation format version speaker causerie_reciter causerie_location quran_reciter recite_type singer interpreter composer music_writer musical_genre lyrics orchestra distribution author actor fiction_writer adaptation } } `; export default function FetchAudios() { // fetch the audios const { data, loading, error } = useQuery(FETCH_AUDIOS); if (loading) return
loading...
; if (error) return
error: {error.message}
; // check if it's an admin const token = localStorage.getItem("adminToken"); if (!token) { window.location.href = "/admin/login"; return null; } return (
all audios
{/* head */} {/* row 1 */} {data.audios.map((audio) => ( ))}
TITLE TYPE QUALITY
{audio.title} {audio.type} {audio.quality}
); }
